comments.body:
Maybe better would be to exclude the error via options.  Adding `import_duplicated_library_named` should do the trick.  That is, in `optionsBody`:

```
analyzer:
  errors:
    import_duplicated_library_named: ignore
    ...

```

PS: the error code name looks odd to me but it is what it is (defined in `error.dart`).
We don't want to exclude the error, we just want to catch it and remove the temporary filename from the message.
Ah, I see.  Over-zealous on my part. :+1:
